IDEs

items.description: Tools and templates for distributing LÖVE games
Using AppImageKit you can package LÖVE games as AppImages that run on common Linux-based operating systems, such as RHEL, CentOS, Ubuntu, Fedora, Debian and derivatives; one game = one file.
items.title: AppImageKit

items.description: Multi-platform, easy to use tool supporting Windows, macOS, Linux.
items.title: boon

items.description: Build & deploy cross-platform game packages on  popular platforms. Supports Android, iOS, Linux, maxOS, Windows.
items.title: LÖVE Actions

items.description: Preconfigured VSCode/Codium. Build for Android, iOS, HTML5, Linux, macOS and Windows and automatically publish to Itch.io.
items.title: LÖVE Game Development & Automated Build System

items.description: Downloadable application (made in LÖVE!) that can build games for Windows, macOS, and Linux regardless of your own OS.
items.title: love-build

items.description: Build and deploy games on itch.io (supports windows and web exports).
items.title: love-deploy

items.description: Fast and simple command-line tool that builds binaries for you. Supports Windows, macOS, and Linux.
items.title: love-export

items.description: Packages LÖVE Games using GitHub Actions. Supports Windows, Linux, and Android.
items.title: love-fuser

items.description: Simple CLI to package your LÖVE Game in seconds.
